title: Ikoo Deep Caring Mask - Detox & Balance - 100 ml
description: Smoothie for the hair. For hair spoiled by excessive treatments, our mask is the one-time-fix. The infusion of blueberry, blackberry, and sea kelp assist in detoxing and returning balance to the hair while strengthening to prevent breakage. Size: 100 ml
